LanguageData.GoJuice.label: go-juice
LanguageData.GoJuice.description: A synthetic combat drug developed for space marines during the early days of interplanetary warfare. Go-juice blocks pain and increases the user's melee and shooting abilities. It also enhances movement speed. However, the military chemists who created it were never able to remove its addictiveness.
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.label: high on go-juice
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.stages.0.label: high on go-juice
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.stages.0.description: Feeling pumped but calm. I am the sniper bullet in flight, ready to cut through you.
LanguageData.Chemical_GoJuice.label: go-juice
LanguageData.Chemical_GoJuice.description: Because of a go-juice addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.label: go-juice tolerance
LanguageData.GoJuiceAddiction.label: go-juice addiction
LanguageData.GoJuiceAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.GoJuiceWithdrawal.stages.1.label: go-juice withdrawal
LanguageData.GoJuiceWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm all fuzzy and can't think straight. My limbs feel heavy, I'm tired and hungry, everything hurts. And why won't my eyes focus properly?
